caption.title: Premotor neurons innervating type Ib MNs Left column, spatial muscle groups named as in Figure 1.
caption.p: Middle column, type Ib MNs innervating 1–3 muscles in each muscle group (synonym, parentheses); the immature neuromodulatory VUMs are not shown. Right column, premotor interneurons innervating the indicated MNs. Premotor connectivity uncertain, parentheses.
